/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees and power lines, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall mood of the image is peaceful and serene, as if inviting the viewer to take a moment and appreciate the beauty of the everyday.
